analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ yathābhatam nikkhittaḥ evam sagge

original: Bhaddakena ca sīlena, bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: bhaddakena ca sīlena bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyā

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ puggalaḥ yathābhatam nikkhittaḥ evam sagge ti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
